label: bike
caption: A young bicyclist, wearing a helmet and sporting a big smile, is mid-air as they ride over a colorful ramp at a skatepark. The ramp itself is covered in vibrant graffiti, adding to the energetic atmosphere of the scene. In the background, other skateboarders and BMX riders can be seen taking turns on various obstacles, creating a lively and dynamic environment for thrill-seekers.
